definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: mng. dub.; text perhaps corrupt; only Am 4:3 [[וְהִשְׁלַכְתֶּנַׇה הַהַרְמ֫וֹנׇה]] and ye shall cast them (your [[אחרית]], posterity, AE; Hi RV cast [yourselves], but read rather with Vrss as pass. ´[[וְהָשְׁל]] shall be cast) into Harmon; if text be sound, some locality must be meant, though the nature of the allusion is lost (AV, into the palace, treats [[הרמון]] improb. as = [[ארמון]]). Targum SyrVer have mountain (s) of Armenia ([[הַר מוֹנׇה]]), Symm Armenia, cf. Lag:Ges. Abh. 172, Hoffm:ZAW iii. 1882, 102, of exile; Hi-St for ´[[ה]] rd. [[הֲדַדְרִמּוֹנׇה]] to Hadadrimmon, n.pr.loc. in plain of Jezreel, so Gunning; LXX ei)v to\ o)/rov to\ (Romman, whence Ew ingeniously [[ההר רמונה]] and ye shall cast Rimmonah (name of idol, supposed fem. of Rimmon 2Ki 5:18) to the mountains.
